attributes.action: Disolve Parliament forever and install The Sheriff of Lancaster as supreme leader of the United Kingdom and all her territories
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is quite clear that the current political system does not work. This proposal is to install the Sheriff of Lancashire as supreme leader of the UK answerable only to The Queen (and successor) and God Almighty

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
